label: A2B_tP12_92_b_a-001
title: $\alpha$-Cristobalite (SiO$_{2}$, low, $C30$) Structure
comments:
If the silicon atoms are replaced by aluminium and phosphorous atoms the structure is very similar to the \href{current_web_home_dir/AB4C_oC24_20_a_2c_b-001}{``low cristobalite'' form of AlPO$_{4}$}. 
 \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_tP12_92_b_a-002}{Paralellurite} and \href{current_web_home_dir/A2B_tP12_92_b_a-001}{$\alpha$-cristobalite ($C30$)} have the saem AFLOW prototype label, A2B\_tP12\_92\_b\_a. They are generated by the same symmetry operations with different sets of parameters ({\tt --params}) specified in their corresponding CIF files.
